sub_title: Lead Product Owner Data Platforms bij RTL
summary:
Someone once asked me: 'What's your claim of fame', and in all honesty it's my teams. 

Over the years I've become more and more pationate about building teams that work together effectively as a unit, but also connect on a personal level (as much as possible). For this I've participated in trainings for team building, coaching, management and communication.

Apart from that, I'm an analytical person driven to optimize processes. I have extensive experience in stakeholder / project management and IT, so I love to interact with engineers as well as the business. I take decisions and set priorities based on business value and metrics and do so in a strong collaboration with my stakeholders.  

Through my career I have learned to function well in a team and to act as a pivot between various departments. I am eager to learn and like to immerse myself in new matter.

contributors.headline: Lead Product Owner Data Platforms bij RTL

projects.title: ABB
projects.description:
Project Manager Supply Chain Execution (SCE)
Stream integration with WM / MM / SD / PP / SM / QM

Project Description:
ABB is a large international company which runs on SAP. ABB wants to consolidate, simplify and harmonize its IT landscape through the introduction of global maintained servers and the introduction of S/4 HANA. Till that time the different countries and their respective sites must be optimized and standardized. As part of the global service team, Rick acts as both Project Manager for various projects and as Work stream Lead Supply Cain (WM and MM) for ABB to accomplish the following tasks:

Tasks and responsibilities: 
-	Delivering a realistic project planning
-	Lead and support a team of  Local Business Process Owners and Key users on the basis of the project planning
-	Report progress towards the business and the central team 
-	Timely detection and escalation of project bottlenecks
-	Provide SAP experience and knowledge where needed about Supply Chain Execution
-	Create Local Change Requests and their related business cases
-	Preparation towards and the successful organizing of the go-live for five BU’s spread over four offices within the Netherlands, distributed across two separated go-lives
-	Cut-over planning
-	Resource planning
-	Project risk analysis
-	Creating Business cases
-	Change Management support (process wise and adjustment wise)
-	Transition guidance
-	Module support: SD, PP, SM
-	Transport Interfacing setup
-	Go-Live support
-	Testing support (E2E, UAT, Performance)
-	Training support

Results: 
The optimization of Service and Purchasing processes and still ongoing projects.

projects.title: Mediq NL
projects.description:
Project Manager Supply Chain Execution (SCE) WM / MM
Stream integration with SD / PP / SM / QM

Project Description:
Mediq has grown significantly over the years and has enlisted numerous companies of which all have continued as an internal Business Unit (BU). Mediq has chosen to implement SAP to establish unity between the BU’s, but also to move toward a more efficient and clearer system landscape with more functionality then their current setup. During the project Rick has been appointed as the Project Manager and Work stream Lead Supply Cain (WM and MM) for Mediq Direct Nederland to accomplish the following tasks:

Tasks and responsibilities: 
-	Delivering a realistic project planning
-	Lead and support a team of  Local Business Process Owners and Key users on the basis of the project planning
-	Report progress towards the business and the central team 
-	Timely detection and escalation of project bottlenecks
-	Provide SAP experience and knowledge where needed about Supply Chain Execution
-	Create Local Change Requests and their related business cases
-	Preparation towards and the successful organizing of the go-live for five BU’s spread over four offices within the Netherlands, distributed across two separated go-lives
-	Cut-over planning
-	Resource planning
-	Project risk analysis
-	Creating Business cases
-	Change Management support (process wise and adjustment wise)
-	Transition guidance
-	Module support: SD, PP, SM
-	Transport Interfacing setup
-	Go-Live support
-	Testing support (E2E, UAT, Performance)
-	Training support
-	Part of CAB (Change Advisory Board)
-	Part of PAB (Project Advisory Board)
-	Part of the steerco

Results: 
-	Successful Go-Live for 3 Business Units

projects.title: SCS
projects.description:
Lead Consultant WM

Project Description:
On account of a new legal obligation starting April 2015 it will be mandatory for SCS to register the storage and movements of their explosives based on the serial numbers of each individual unit. SCS has asked Perfect for People to make this possible within SAP in combination with WM. Rick has taken over the project from a colleague and has, in a short amount of time, made the project his own.

Tasks and responsibilities: 
-	EDI interface tested
-	IDOC mapping tested and improved
-	Setup Handling Unit Management
-	RF scanning menu setup and enhancement
-	Managed a team of external parties to establish the interconnection
-	Inbound process setup and tested
-	Time estimation and planning created for the Outbound flow
-	Time estimation and planning created for the different suppliers
-	Outbound process setup and tested
-	Training given
-	Managed colleagues
-	Prepared and performed the go-live

Results: 
-	All required functionality has been delivered, tested and brought live to full satisfaction of the customer.
-	During the project, Rick managed four different external parties (Allegro hosting / Orion XML translator / Supplier / TTE) to establish a correct interconnection between them and for the timely delivery of test files
-	Rick has worked on the following during the project: IDOC’s, XML’s, HU’s en scanning.

contributors.headline: Lead Product Owner Data Platforms bij RTL

projects.title: Smit Tranformers
projects.description:
Lead Consultant WM

Project Description:
Smit Transformers currently manages material stocks on IM (inventory Management) level. Due to custom transaction within the PP (production) module for the staging of production materials Rick was tasked to setup and perform a demo on Smit’s own acceptance system environment. The demo was received to everyone’s full satisfaction and together with Rick, Smit has entered the Blueprint phase of the implementation.

Tasks and responsibilities: 
-	Enterprise structure
-	WM Baseline setup
-	Handling Unit Management
-	RF scanning
-	Guidance
-	Documentation
-	Demo
-	Blueprint Workshops
-	Blueprint document
-	Solution description

Results: 
-	Rick has completed the WM setup and the preparation of the demo within five days. The Blueprint phase has been concluded and Smit has indicated that it wants to continue with Perfect for People as its implementation partner.
-	By special request from Smit, Rick has returned multiple times to provide extra information. Smit has indicated that it will proceed with the implementation of the WM module and that they see Rick as the appointed consultant for the job.

contributors.headline: Lead Product Owner Data Platforms bij RTL

projects.title: Supertape
projects.description:
Team Lead & Lead Consultant WM / MM

Project Description:
Supertape has already been working with SAP for about 10 years and have extended their system landscape towards their subsidiary in France where Perfect for People has performed the training. During that project the employees were introduced to a lot of new functionality and the question arose if the current SAP system shouldn’t undergo an optimization. Together with 3 other consultants, Rick was tasked to perform an optimization analysis and document their findings.

Tasks and responsibilities: 
-	Planning and coordination
-	Team management
-	WM analysis
-	MM analysis
-	Documentation
-	Result presentation

Results: 
-	Rick was responsible for the planning and coordination of the project, customer relations and quality assurance. The project has given Supertape a better insight in their current system and have indicated that they will introduce and implement the recommended improvements in a joint effort with Perfect for People.
-	Planning and coordination of the team.

contributors.headline: Lead Product Owner Data Platforms bij RTL

projects.title: Westfalen
projects.description:
Team Lead Consultant SD / MM

Project Description:
Westfalen Deventer has been working with an SAP template for more than 10 years provided by their German parent organization which does not fully satisfies their need to perform their day-to-day business. Rick was responsible for the management of 2 junior consultants, quality assurance of the documentation and the final end-user training.

Tasks and responsibilities: 
-	Planning and coordination
-	Team management
-	Documentation
-	Training

Results: 
-	The training has been concluded in full satisfaction of the end users.
-	Following the training, Westfalen has asked Rick to prepare a report with recommendations to improve system optimization, which better fits the Westfalen Deventer way of working.

contributors.headline: Lead Product Owner Data Platforms bij RTL

projects.title: Fiskars Garden Delight - SAP Warehouse Management
projects.description:
SAP Warehouse Management deployment at Fiskars Garden Delight in Finland and Poland.

Project Description: 
During the last couple of years a little over half of the Fiskars business has been migrated to SAP. For the implementation of SAP with Fiskars Home & Garden divisions, Rick was responsible for the configuration of the WM and MM modules. During the Blueprint, Stabilization and Realization phases of the project Rick has performed the following activities:

Tasks and responsibilities: 
-	Blueprint 
-	FIT/Demo sessions for Home & Garden projects
-	FIT Analysis
-	(Baseline) Configuration
-	Design of tailor made solutions
-	Specification and testing of SAP BW reports
-	System Integration Testing
-	UAT guidance
-	Training
-	Cutover planning for the Garden Delight project
-	Cutover for the Stabilization project
-	After Go-Live support for the Stabilization project
-	Supporting previous Live Units

Results: 
-	In his time with Fiskars, Rick has performed the needed preparations for the go-live of 3 plants in Finland, Poland and Denmark and performed the cutover for the Stabilization project.
-	For this project Rick has travelled between Finland, Poland and Denmark with Helsinki Finland as the central project location.

contributors.headline: Lead Product Owner Data Platforms bij RTL

projects.title: Ardagh - SAP Warehouse Management
projects.description:
SAP Warehouse Management deployment in the Netherlands and the United Kingdom.

Project Description: 
Packaging manufacturer Ardagh migrated its glass department to SAP. To stimulate a unity of working, it was decided to also migrate its Europe metal packaging department to SAP. This would be done in different phases of four clusters. Rick was designated as Cluster 4 (NL / UK) Lead for the Plan to Inventory Stream focusing on Warehouse Management.

Tasks and responsibilities: 
-	Blueprint 
-	FIT Analyses
-	Configuration
-	Design of tailor made solutions
-	Specification of SAP BW reports
-	System Integration Testing
-	UAT guidance
-	Training
-	Cutover 
-	After Go-Live Support

Results: 
-	He was responsible for six plants.
-	All these activities have been successfully completed for the customer. In addition, he has correctly documented and properly planned everything.
-	This project included 4 plants in the Netherlands and 2 in the UK. The project team was located in Paris France and Deventer. Rick has traveled to the different plants on several occasions.

contributors.headline: Lead Product Owner Data Platforms bij RTL

projects.title: AkzoNobel SAP Implementatie
projects.description:
SAP Warehouse Management Implementation from Blueprint to Go-Live fase.

Project Description: 
Following the Industrial Coatings part of Akzo Nobel, Coatings and Packaging also moved to SAP. This in order to better integrate all the locations and to work in the same way. Rick was a junior consultant co-responsible for the design and layout of the SAP Warehouse Management section. He has been active in the project from the Blueprint phase up to the Go-Live support. During the project, Rick has quickly grown a lot, which resulted in replacing the Lead consultant during the Go-Live after which Rick independently supported the different sites with Elbeuf France as his central location.

Tasks and responsibilities: 
-	Blueprint Documentation
-	Customizing 
-	Deign of tailor made solution (including QM z-transaction) 
-	Training
-	System Integration Testing 
-	UAT guidance
-	Cutover
-	After Go-Live Support
-	Issue solving 

Results: 
-	He has also gained, through the project, knowledge of SD, MM and QM. The latter had, as a result a good working Quality custom transaction.
-	Akzo Nobel and its users have given positive feedback about the activities and conduct of Rick, which resulted in a successful Go-Live for WM. Because of this, Rick was specifically asked back by the customer for extra support in Hull England.
-	The involved plants were: Hilden (DE), Hull / Birmingham (UK), Elbeuf (FR), Vilafranca (ESP) with Hilden as its central project location.

contributors.headline: Lead Product Owner Data Platforms bij RTL

profile_positions.description:
It's my responsibility to provide the platforms, tools, services and quality data to enable RTL to gain the insights, perform the analysis and use the data science needed to grow.

My teams do this by gathering, transforming and publishing data on Snowflake and providing and maintaining the tools for the Data Scientists to do their job. The landscape on Azure is comprised, among others, of: 

- Snowflake
- Druid
- Kubernetes
- Kafka
- Airflow
- DBT
- Concourse
- Argo CD

To ensure an increase of performance and improve maintenance capabilitites we migrated towards Snowflake and from AWS towards Azure.

This is done in an Agile environment according to the Srcum methodology where stakeholder management is crucial.
